title: Shaco W arm time reduce with rank?
body:
2 seconds early game is pretty quick, low attackspeed, lowmovespeed, lower defenses. It seems fine here.

2 seconds late game might as well not be placed at all.

OR 

Give them AoE protection.

Majority of the time people don't even know a box has been placed, they just continue on as usual and let Hydra/Hurricane/AOE skills just remove it.


It's the most iconic part of his kit, but it becomes pretty irrelevant later in the game.

replies.body: Shaco definitely needs changes like this for his late game. Its annoying when I try to duel yi but his q instakills the box I place on him and he runs me down with red trinket and murders me with basic attacks.
i though they already implement this

It's not.

It should be, but Riot are worthless turds.
up them , i think is a good idea
posd: is only irrelevant if u go ad, if u go ap u can kill someone with 2 boxes on the right place

> [{quoted}](name=Danielpezglobo,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1PLHrUQO,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-07-01T11:15:14.985+0000)
>
> posd: is only irrelevant if u go ad, if u go ap u can kill someone with 2 boxes on the right place

Until late game, then its useless.
unless the guy stay still/doesn't attack the box, no.

Playing bloodmoon against so many AOE damage champs was the worst. Your boxes just melt if you try to use them during a fight and they are really only good for camping or using them as a clean getaway
